00090 /*
00091  * Structures for parsing X.509 certificates
00092  */
00093 typedef struct _x509_buf
00094 {
00095     int tag;
00096     int len;
00097     unsigned char *p;
00098 }
00099 x509_buf;

00102 {

00106 }
